thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: China’s Bad Banks Face a Case of Indigestion

author: Anjani Trivedi
title: China’s Bad Banks Face a Case of Indigestion
text:
The share prices of China’s big banks are surging. But the institutions tasked with cleaning up their balance sheets are struggling to keep up.
The optimism surrounding Chinese banks partly stems from higher domestic market interest rates, caused by Beijing’s ongoing campaign to deleverage the economy. Investors hope those higher rates will help widen banks’ net interest margins, a key profit engine.
Also...
